transcript:
Customer: Kaushalya Dashrath ke Nandan

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ruko rukiye.
Customer: Sir bina baat kare sir ji bina baat kare solution nahi milega.
Customer: Nahi humko solution nahi chahiye IndiaMART humko rakhna hi nahi hai.
Executive: Are IndiaMART nahi rakhna sir baat to kijiye na sir kya dikkat aa rahi hai main aapko dikkat ka solution bata.
Customer: Nahi aapke pass mera solution nahi hai aapke pass mera solution nahi hai.
Executive: Sir sir suno abhi ek minute dejiye suno sir aise aise dekho aap suno aap naraz naraz hoke baat nahi hoti naraz hoke baat nahi hoti sir naraz hona nahi.
Customer: ID ek baat suno main main ye line mein 9 saal se hai theek hai na main dusra company bhi kaam kar raha tha pehle ab main company khud khola hai uske pass wo jyada paisa diya bola jyada lead aa raha hai mere pass lead nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Are sir aisa kuch nahi hota sir aisa kuch nahi hota.
Customer: To wo jo customer ke pass lead mil raha hai IndiaMART mein yaar mere pass mein lead nahi aa raha hai main mera dusra ID khola hai usme lead dikha raha hai aapke pass lead nahi dikha raha hai.
Executive: Sir sir suno suno aisa kuch nahi hai aap galat samajh rahe ho sir aisa kuch nahi hai aapne same cheez ab ab aap trade India se mere ko comparison karoge to main us cheez ka jawab nahi de paunga na sir trade India mein kya chal raha hai IndiaMART mein kya chal raha hai hamari cheeze alag hai meri baat samjho aapka concern ye hai ki aapko ek hafte ya 10 din se by lead nahi aaya theek hai main bhi aapko wohi cheez keh raha hu sir agar West Bengal mein by lead generate nahi hoga to aap kaise dikh jayega.
Customer: Agar generate hoga to aapko bhi dikhega mere ko bhi dikhega aise to nahi hai ki aap hi ko nahi dikh raha aur mere ko dikh raha hai mere ko bhi nahi dikh raha sir yaha pe by lead kaise generate ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir trade India alag platform hai sir sir trade India sir ji suno suno trade India alag platform hai aap samjho meri baat sir aapne trade India ka paisa alag diya hai na IndiaMART ka alag diya trade India alag cheez hai.
Customer: Trade India wale by lead jo generate kar rahe hai mujhe kya pata wo genuine hai nahi hai mujhe ye batao acha main jo cheeze main by lead main aap main yaha se itna bhi call diya na itna bhi lead diya ye bhi.
Executive: Sir dekho mujhe mujhe ye cheez nahi pata lekin hamare yaha jo bhi by lead generate hoti hai wo sari genuine hoti hai ab aapke upar hai sir aap convert kar pa rahe hai nahi kar pa rahe hai lekin wo sari cheeze genuine hoti hai aap is baat ko samjho.
Customer: Wo to theek hai theek hai aap mera baat suno mera baat suno sir aise nahi hota na bacho ki tarah mat karo na sir baat nahi karna kya bakchodi kar raha hai aap se.
Executive: Main keh raha hu bacho mat karo main keh raha hu bacho main keh raha hu bacho ki tarah mat karo na sir.
Customer: Nahi bacho matlab baat nahi hai dekho aap mera ek baat hai aap bola lead nahi mal raha ek hafte se baat nahi hai theek hai man gaya main solution ho gaya hum rakh diya call sir ji mera dusra bhi kaam hai.
Executive: Sir aapka dusra kaam hai manta hu main aapko sirf itna kehna chah raha hu sir pareshan mat ho aap jab tak aapko by lead nahi aa raha hai West Bengal ka aap direct inquiries pe thoda focus karo theek hai direct inquiries par kaam karo aur direct inquiries pe focus karo jo samne se buyer aapko call ya message kar rahe hai unpe baat karo.
Customer: Ho gaya okay.
Executive: Sir mera to ho gaya tha main to aapka solution de raha hu aapko aapko sunna sunna nahi hai to aapki heda kya karu wo okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads in West Bengal.

- Customer compares IndiaMART with Trade India.

- Doubts the genuineness of buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the difference between IndiaMART and Trade India.

- Executive advised focusing on direct inquiries.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trade india, direct inquiries, west bengal
